heightMinimum.title: Minimum height
heightMinimum.description: Posters must be hung at least 2.3 meters above the road surface.

roadSafety.title: Road safety
roadSafety.description: Posters must not obstruct road signs, signals, or otherwise compromise road safety.

intersectionDistance.title: Distance from intersections
intersectionDistance.description: Posters must not be hung closer than 10 meters from an intersection.

posterSpacing.title: Poster spacing
posterSpacing.description: There must be at least 50 meters between posters from the same party.

hangingPeriod.title: Hanging period
hangingPeriod.description: Posters may be hung at the earliest on the 4th Saturday before election day.

removalDeadline.title: Removal deadline
removalDeadline.description: Posters must be removed no later than 8 days after election day.

privateProperty.title: Private property
privateProperty.description: Posters may not be hung on private property without permission.

contactInfo.title: Contact information
contactInfo.description: All election posters must include the name, address, and phone number of the responsible person.

motorwayProhibition.title: Motorway prohibition
motorwayProhibition.description: Posters may not be hung along motorways and express roads.

maxSize.title: Maximum size
maxSize.description: Posters may not exceed 0.8 m² in area.

violations.heightTooLow: Poster is too low. Minimum {{min}}m required.
violations.tooCloseToIntersection: Too close to intersection. Minimum {{min}}m required.
violations.tooCloseToOtherPoster: Too close to another poster. Minimum {{min}}m required.
violations.outsideHangingPeriod: Hanging is not allowed outside the hanging period.
